blog:item.title: New DeeEnEs version 2.3.25 and some site layout changes
blog:item.blog:content: Uploaded a new version of DeeEnEs (2.3.25) which adds the DynDNS domains (isa-geek) that were still missing. Also took the opportunity to change the layout and coloring of the site a bit. Now uses a lot more CSS and should also work on Mozilla/Netscape 7 browsers.
